name: HKCorrelationTypeIdentifier
desc: The identifiers that create correlation type objects.

items.name: static let bloodPressure: HKCorrelationTypeIdentifier
items.desc: A correlation sample that combines a systolic sample and a diastolic sample into a single blood pressure reading.

items.name: static let food: HKCorrelationTypeIdentifier
items.desc: Food correlation types combine any number of nutritional samples into a single food object.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Returns a newly initialized correlation type identifier using the provided string.
